section.title: We want to know your opinion
section.para: If you find any errors in this manual, we are happy to receive your suggestions. If you detect a typographical or conceptual error you can send it to us by email with the following information from the manual:
Manual's identifier: ManagerInstallation_rBHorama_Enterprise-v.3 [EN](2015-06), chapter or section and page number in which there is an error, and the part of text that contains that error.
This information allows us to easily locate the error and correct it in order to improve the documentation accompanying our products.
We also appreciate any suggestions regarding the organization of information so we can optimize our manuals.
Always check the latest version of the documentation available at http://support.redborder.net
You can send your comments to the email address: info@redborder.net
